name: Where is Winston?
description:
Jeff is the pilot of the Bobcat-13 freighter. He ships goods between planets and occasionally moons. He has four cats but he's a bit forgetful sometimes...

UPDATE: Corrected the descriptions for the stars, now the hint properly states "hot blue" instead of "cold".

Made for the 13 kB JavaScript competition, js13kGames 2017. If you like it please Like it on the entry page and Tweet it to help me in Facebook/Twitter Specials category. Thank you!

See the entry here: http://js13kgames.com/entries/where-is-winston

Full source code: https://github.com/gheja/lost13k
